consumerEServiceCatalog.title: E-service catalog
consumerEServiceCatalog.description: The e-service catalog contains all the databases that other entities have made available. You can join those of interest to you.

consumerAgreementsList.title: Your submitted requests
consumerAgreementsList.description: Submitted requests will be collected in this area.

providerEServiceList.title: My e-services
providerEServiceList.description: Manage and provide new e-services from this dedicated area.

providerAgreementsList.title: Received requests
providerAgreementsList.description: In this area you can manage all the requests that have been sent to you by entities that want to use your e-services. Received requests are collected here.

consumerPurposesList.title: My submitted purposes
consumerPurposesList.description: When your requests for use are accepted, you will need to fill a purpose to describe how you will process the data you receive. Your purposes are collected in this area.

consumerClientList.title: My API client e-services
consumerClientList.description: The e-service clients allow you to interface with the provider's API specified in the e-services for which you have an active fruition request and purpose. Your e-service clients are collected here.

consumerClientM2MList.title: My API client interop
consumerClientM2MList.description: Interoperability clients allow you to interface with the APIs exposed by PDND Interoperability read and write. Your clients are collected here.

providerPurposesList.title: Received purposes
providerPurposesList.description: Entities that want to use your e-services will need to indicate how they will process the data they receive. Received purposes are collected in this area.

consumerDebugVoucher.title: client assertion debug
consumerDebugVoucher.description: The debug tool allows you to highlight any anomalies contained in your client assertion necessary for obtaining an access token.

consumerSimulateGetVoucher.title: Simulate getting a voucher
consumerSimulateGetVoucher.description: Through this feature you can simulate obtaining a voucher. Once you have selected the parameters, you can perform a client assertion, request a voucher and verify that it is compatible.

tenantCertifier.title: Tenant certifier
tenantCertifier.description: Create and manage certified attributes and assign them to compliant entities.

providerKeychainsList.title: My provider keychains
providerKeychainsList.description: In this area you can view and manage the keychains associated with your e-services, uploading the public keys necessary for verifying responses from users.

delegations.title: Delegation management
delegations.description: Indicate your availability to delegate and manage the delegations you have conferred or received.

providerEServiceTemplatesCatalog.title: E-service templates catalog
providerEServiceTemplatesCatalog.description: Templates allow you to create e-service instances from pre-existing template.

providerEServiceTemplatesList.title: My template e-service
providerEServiceTemplatesList.description: Manage and provide new e-service templates from this dedicated area.

consumerPurposeTemplatesList.title: My Facilitated Purpose Templates
consumerPurposeTemplatesList.description: Make a facilitated purpose template available to help other participating entities more easily complete the risk analysis.

consumerPurposeTemplatesCatalog.title: Facilitated Purpose Templates Catalog
consumerPurposeTemplatesCatalog.description: Purpose templates are shared models among all participants. After your fruition request is accepted, you can create a new purpose starting from one of these models, which contains a part of the pre-filled risk analysis.
